title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SuggestArticlesResponse
name: SuggestArticlesResponse
description:

params.name: data.article_answers
params.description: Articles ordered by score in descending order.

params.name: data.latest_message
params.description: The name of the latest conversation message used to compile suggestion for. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/messages/<Message ID>.

params.name: data.context_size
params.description: Number of messages prior to and including [latest_message][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestArticlesResponse.latest_message] to compile the suggestion. It may be smaller than the [SuggestArticlesRequest.context_size][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestArticlesRequest.context_size] field in the request if there aren't that many messages in the conversation.
